label: 陣の申文
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: reports and petitions from the provinces discussed by members of the Council of State in the guards’ chamber east of the Shishiiden within the residential palace. That chamber was known as the jin 陣 in Heian times. [紫宸殿]
